name: GitPullRequestLabels
description: Automatically suggest and manage labels for pull requests using projex
helpMarkDown: This task uses projex to suggest labels for the current pull request and automatically applies them using Azure DevOps API. It also removes labels that are no longer relevant.
author: MaikRestrepo

inputs.name: removeOutdatedLabels
inputs.label: Remove Outdated Labels
inputs.helpMarkDown: Remove labels from the pull request that are not in the suggested labels list

inputs.name: dryRun
inputs.label: Dry Run
inputs.helpMarkDown: Only show what labels would be added/removed without actually making changes

inputs.name: customLabels
inputs.label: Custom Labels
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional comma-separated labels to add beyond the suggested ones
